string-array.item: Choose whole-grain bread and cereals. They are so much better than refined ones
Don\'t go shopping without a list. It will help you to not give in the impulse
The egg is one of the best protein you can eat
Exercise/workout everyday, but don\'t overdo it
Drink enough water, at least 2 liter per day
Bake or roast instead of grilling or frying
Order a healthy menu at the restaurant
Try at least one new healthy recipe per week
Choose baked potatoes over french fries
Eat your greens first. It will satiate you
Run away from juice: eat the fruit instead
Don\'t be lazy: Good nutrition and exercise often go hand in hand
Replace sugary beverages with water or sugar-free soda
Bake or roast instead of grilling or frying
